TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void ClosedHandler(object o, ClosedArgs args);
.class public auto ansi sealed ClosedHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate

remarks.para: Event data is passed via the parameter.

To attach a to an event, add the ClosedHandler instance to the event. The methods referenced by the ClosedHandler instance are invoked whenever the event is raised, until the ClosedHandler is removed from the event.
